title: Medical students not trained to prescribe medical marijuana

title_detail.value: Medical students not trained to prescribe medical marijuana

summary: More than half of the states in the US now allow some type of legal marijuana use, primarily medical marijuana. But, in a survey of medical residents and deans at the nation's medical schools, researchers have found that the majority of schools are not teaching their students about medical marijuana, and the majority of students don't feel prepared to discuss the subject with patients.
